The resort has a laid-back vibe and excellent amenities to help you unwind.

Another great option is the [Honeymoon Inn](https://www.booking.com/hotel/in/honeymoon-inn.html?aid=1710306&no_rooms=1&group_adults=2), which is situated right in the heart of Manali. This charming property provides comfortable accommodations, beautiful gardens, and a convenient location for exploring the town's sights and markets.
